verse.name: v2
v3
v4
v5
verse.lines:
God gives me life,God gives in me
He feeds my soul,he guides my ways
And every grief with joy repays.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
3.O bond of love,that dost unite
The servant to his living Lord
could i dare live and not requite

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Such love then death death were meet reward:
I can not live unless to prove
such love for such unmeasured love.
